channel.title: Source run.bat errors
channel.description:
there is the run.bat files on this source and the first one says this: @echo off title Your server Source "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx256m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server echo The server has started.
and when I run it quickly pops up and goes away before I can read or do anything.
The #2 run.bat says this in it: @echo off C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui start exit
and this is error message for #2: "Microsoft Windows [Version 6.2.9200] (c) 2012 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
C:\Users\michael\Desktop\2speced server\2speced server>"
#3 run.bat has this in it: @echo off title Shard Run "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx758m -classpath bin server.Server release nogui pause exit
and gets this error for #3: "Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server Press any key to continue . . ."
Its rly getting annoying cause I been looking it up and trying to fix but yeah not working lol. Hope I gave enough info for someone to help me figure out what to do

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Ya, then everything is fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

this is my compiling code:
@echo off
@title Building
@ECHO Building files…
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe” -d bin src\org\model\items*.java src\org\model\minigames*.java src\org*.java src\org\model\npcs*.java src\org\model\players*.java src\org\model\players\content*.java src\org\model\players\packets*.java src\org\model\shops*.java src\org\net*.java src\org\util*.java
pause

this is what prompt says:
Building files…
Press any key to continue . . .

P.S- I seen you on j-team thread and added you on Skype thinking it might make it easier to help me.

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

What is it saying in the prompt once your server finishes compiling?

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

Scape-JAVA:

.class files are pretty much a core part of the Java platform. When you compile a source file it generates this code called byte code and the JVM reads it and translates it. So technically, once you recompile your .java files the independence feature for java should be able to generate the same byte code.

Oh man that’s pretty easily understood well makes since so I did that and I did what I normaly did to compiler to make em work and I think it works but im not positive if its actually compiling I just know its not showing errors

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

.class files are pretty much a core part of the Java platform. When you compile a source file it generates this code called byte code and the JVM reads it and translates it. So technically, once you recompile your .java files the independence feature for java should be able to generate the same byte code.

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

delete the server.class file?? I figured something like that would mess up the whole thing but your on the j-team lol so ill try it out

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Add a pause at the end of your first run batch file. It should stop the box from opening and closing so quickly. As for the ‘error: could not find server.Server’ thing, try deleting the .class files and recompiling the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

i was told that by a frined so i tried to move the server.class right beside the run.bat hopping that would do somthing and it stuff says the same things so i still waiting for a reply of what i should do… I also tried editing the run.bat and adding the addressbar info telling it where the server.class is located and it still didnt do anything

Read full topic

item.title: Source run.bat errors
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

there is the run.bat files on this source and the first one says this:
@echo off
title Your server Source
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx256m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
echo The server has started.

and when I run it quickly pops up and goes away before I can read or do anything.

The #2 run.bat says this in it:
@echo off
C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
start
exit

and this is error message for #2:
"Microsoft Windows [Version 6.2.9200]
© 2012 Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

C:\Users\michael\Desktop\2speced server\2speced server>"

#3 run.bat has this in it:
@echo off
title Shard Run
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx758m -classpath bin server.Server release nogui
pause
exit

and gets this error for #3:
“Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server
Press any key to continue . . .”

Its rly getting annoying cause I been looking it up and trying to fix but yeah not working lol.
Hope I gave enough info for someone to help me figure out what to do

Read full topic
